ygData.subject: Re: Incomplete/Wrong information (RE: Dark Reaver)
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, however was being quiet as I figured I d just get flamed if I said anything, oh well, been flamed before :). Omeg
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, however was being quiet as I figured I'd just get flamed if I said
anything, oh well, been flamed before :).

Omeg


>I believe he was thinking the Reaver of the Dead. Dark Reaver is dropped
>by the
>Cav, Reaver of the Dead is a quest (I think SK and Necro only).
>
>The fact that he didn't know, got confused or anything else doesn't make
>him a
>retard. I'm getting upset that people keep flaming others to boost their
>own
>ego. It's not like most of us haven't posted incorrect or incomplete
>information before.
